name: plugin-marketplace
description: Production-validated protocols, agent definitions, and automation frameworks for systematic AI-assisted software development. Includes modernize workflow (assess → plan → execute) and autocoder autonomous issue resolution. Originally created for .NET migrations, these protocols are universally applicable to any software project.

metadata.description: Production-validated protocols, agent definitions, and automation frameworks for systematic AI-assisted software development. Originally created for .NET migrations, these protocols are universally applicable to any software project requiring structured agent collaboration.

plugins.name: modernize
plugins.description: Complete modernization workflow with multi-agent orchestration (assess viability → create plan → execute). Includes 6 specialized agents and comprehensive protocol documentation for systematic software development

plugins.name: autocoder
plugins.description: Autonomous GitHub issue resolution with infinite loop support. Uses stop hooks to run forever: triages issues, fixes bugs, runs tests, implements approved enhancements, generates proposals. Sleeps when idle, wakes to check for new work.

categories.name: Workflow & Orchestration
categories.description: Complete workflows and multi-agent orchestration systems

categories.name: Automation & Quality
categories.description: Automated issue resolution, testing, and quality improvement systems
